Class ec.transform.coverage.ECovPoint 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.coverage.ECovPoint
public class ECovPoint
extends Object
This class contains data about a particular instrumentation point, such as a method or catch entry. This data is calculated at compile or load time, but used at runtime. The various logging classes are tightly coupled to this one.

See Also:
LogFormat, LogFormatParseable, LogFormatReport, LogFormatSummary

CATCH
CLOSURE
METHOD

ECovPoint(int, int, String, String, String, int)
Create an ECovPoint.

ECovPoint 
 public ECovPoint(int aType,
                  int aLogIndex,
                  String aHumanName,
                  String anActualName,
                  String aDisplayHint,
                  int aLine)
Create an ECovPoint.

Parameters:
aType - The type of instrumentation, one of METHOD, CATCH, CLOSURE
aLogIndex - which element of the in-core log this point corresponds to.
aHumanName - a name a human understands.
anActualName - a name a compiler understands
aDisplayHint - a display hint (currently unused)
aLine - The line number of the thing being instrumented.
